Package exception

package exception
The exception package contains custom exceptions for the Jackaroo game. These exceptions provide specific error handling for invalid actions and selections during gameplay, enhancing the robustness and reliability of the game engine.

Key exception classes in this package:

  • GameException - The base class for all custom exceptions in the game.
  • InvalidSelectionException - Abstract class for exceptions related to invalid selections.
  • InvalidCardException - Thrown when a selected card is invalid for the current game state.
  • InvalidMarbleException - Indicates that a selected marble is not allowed for the intended action.
  • SplitOutOfRangeException - Raised when a split distance selection is outside the valid range.
  • ActionException - Abstract class for exceptions related to illegal gameplay actions.
  • IllegalMovementException - Thrown when an invalid marble movement is attempted.
  • IllegalSwapException - Indicates an invalid attempt to swap marbles on the board.
  • IllegalDestroyException - Raised when an action would wrongly return a marble to the Home Zone.
  • CannotFieldException - Thrown when a marble cannot be legally placed on the board.
  • CannotDiscardException - Thrown when a card cannot be discarded under current game rules.

Example Usage:


 try {
     gameManager.makeMove(player, move);
 } catch (InvalidMoveException e) {
     System.out.println("Invalid move: " + e.getMessage());
 } catch (InvalidCardException e) {
     System.out.println("Invalid card selection: " + e.getMessage());
 }

By using custom exceptions, the Jackaroo game achieves improved error tracking, debugging, and robust input validation.

  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActionException
    Exception thrown when an invalid action occurs in the game.
    CannotDiscardException
    Exception thrown when a discard action cannot be performed in the game.
    CannotFieldException
    Exception thrown when a field action cannot be performed in the game.
    GameException
    An abstract class that represents a game-specific exception.
    IllegalDestroyException
     
    IllegalMovementException
    Exception thrown when an illegal movement action is attempted in the game.
    IllegalSwapException
    Exception thrown when an illegal swap action is attempted in the game.
    InvalidCardException
    Exception thrown when an invalid card selection is made in the game.
    InvalidMarbleException
    Exception thrown when an invalid marble selection is made in the game.
    InvalidSelectionException
    Exception thrown when an invalid selection is made in the game.
    SplitOutOfRangeException
    Exception thrown when a split operation exceeds the allowed range.
